actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Judiciary with amendment, S. Rept. 95-373.
Placed on calendar in Senate under Measures Cleared to be Considered by Unanimous Consent.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue annually a proclamation designating September of each year as "National Sickle Cell Month".

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Judiciary with amendment, S. Rept. 95-373) Authorizes and requests the President to issue a proclamation designating September, 1977, as National Sickle Cell Month.

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue annually a proclamation designating September of each year as "National Sickle Cell Month".
